attributes.action: Ordinary people say no to the new press regulator
attributes.additional_details:
The framework for the new press regulator has been pulled together by a campaigning group representing the interests of the rich and famous - Hacked Off

They have cynically mis-led the public over certain stories to promote the interests of their backers.

Hacked Off have been paid to ensure our politicians have no public accountability and people who choose to court the media for their own gain can protect themselves from being investigated by the media when it doesn't suit them.

The move is Orwellian, deeply damaging to our society and not in the best interests of our Country.

Say no to gagging our press and the new press regulator.
